item.description:
MEDITATION, THE SPIRITUAL SOLUTION TO STRESS, ANGER AND CONFLICT

A morning workshop with Jim Rose, M.Ed.

Stress, anger and conflict are part of life in today’s world, but you don’t have to live with them 24/7. In this half-day interactive workshop/retreat, Jim will engage you through a series of exercises designed to reveal the power of meditation in resolving conflict, healing relationships, and relieving stress. Through several meditation periods, you will also have a chance to experience meditation as a key to a rich inner life. This program is free and includes a complimentary light vegetarian lunch.

Please register: 781.444.9013 or NewEngInfo@sos.org

Free onstreet parking. Please do not park in driveway.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in Nordic Hall, to the right of the entrance

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup
